title: Emergence of Meaning, Jordan Peterson, Paul Vanderklay, Chaos Theory, Stochastic Resonance
description:
Some of this conversation relates to an earlier conversation between Paul Vanderklay
and Karen Wong:  https://youtu.be/HlMgGkwWUNY
Alex's website:  https://cosymbolic.com
Karen's website:  https://karenwongart.com
Follow Alex on Twitter @geoesoteric
Follow Karen @klwong43
Visit Jordan Peterson's lectures on Maps of Meaning, Jonathan Pageau's lectures on symbolism
Erik Verlinde on Gravity and Information Theory:  https://youtu.be/-OlEGq_g2FI
Stephen Strogatz on The Beauty of Calculus:  https://youtu.be/1r6893ga_So

For more on the mind/brain challenge connection, see https://www.closertotruth.com/series/does-consciousness-defeat-materialism-part-2#video-57481
